TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in the town of ORG .
CARDINAL . The applicant is a retired serviceman . On unspecified dates in the past , he had taken part in peace - keeping operations in former GPE .

CARDINAL . On an unspecified date , the applicant instituted proceedings against military unit no . DATE , seeking to recover the unpaid DATE allowances owed to him for his participation in the above operations .
CARDINAL . In the proceedings before ORG of FAC ( ORG гарнизонный военный суд ) the representative of the military unit fully accepted the applicant 's claim .

CARDINAL . He submitted that it was impossible to pay the sum owed to the applicant , since there was no mechanism developed for payment of DATE allowances to servicemen who had been commissioned abroad . Furthermore , no funds were available for this purpose .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of FAC granted the applicant 's claim and ordered the defendant to pay him MONEY ( ORG , CARDINAL at the material time ) .

CARDINAL . The court found that the applicant could not be deprived of the right to receive the sum owed to him because of the absence of an appropriate mechanism of payment . No appeal was lodged and this judgment became final on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG issued an execution writ .
CARDINAL . On an unspecified date , the applicant submitted the execution writ to ORG of ORG .

CARDINAL . It appears that ORG informed the applicant that it was impossible to enforce the judgment as there were no budgetary funds available on the defendant 's account for this purpose . He was advised to apply to ORG for the latter to recover the amount due from ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant forwarded the execution writ to ORG .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG , acting as a supervisory review instance upon the application by the President of that Court , quashed the judgment of DATE as unlawful and unfounded and remitted the case at first instance for a fresh examination .
CARDINAL . It does not appear that the applicant and his counsel were notified of the supervisory review proceedings in advance or that they were able to take part in them .
CARDINAL . According to the Government , in DATE ORG rejected the applicant 's claims . This judgment was upheld on appeal by ORG by CARDINAL decisions dated DATE , DATE .

CARDINAL . According to Articles CARDINAL , CARDINAL and CARDINAL of the old ORG процессуальный кодекс РСФСР ) , in force at the material time , a court judgment , which has become final , is binding and must be executed .
